DOC.brief_title: Integration Family Planning Services Into Anticoagulation Monitoring Services

Our objective : 1 . Determine whether integration education free provision highly effective long-acting reversible contraceptive method within Anticoagulation Monitoring Services ( AMS ) feasible . 2 . Determine whether integration education free provision highly effective long-acting reversible contraceptive method within Anticoagulation Monitoring Services ( AMS ) Clinic prevent unplanned pregnancy .
